alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Walton County through 215 PM CDT... At 140 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Eglin Air Force Base to 13 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Red Bay, Douglass Crossroad, Portland, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Bruce, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Ridge, New Home, Knox Hill, Argyle and Mossy Head. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
